Name: Robbi
Comment: At present world Smart Television is revolutionatry change in the society

Name: Gunner
Comment: Television a great improvement over the radio.Radio pleases the only sense of hearing but television pleases our senses of sight and hearing at the same time.

Name: Tiphany
Comment: There are many different types of programs on Television. The viewer can watch a weather report to prepare for the day.

Name: Theresina
Comment: The content is very appealing because it is realistic and up to date. As TV is a medium that combines moving, color images, and sound, it resembles real life, so the viewers can identify with what they see.

Name: Cordy
Comment: Modern technology means that the content is up to date, for example, news reports can be broadcast live and from all over the world. This means that information is available almost anywhere at any time.

Name: Portia
Comment: People want education, information, and instruction because they are inquisitive and like to learn. TV gives us this in documentaries or educational programs, and in reports or cultural programs.
